main.name: Vinson Ly
main.description: well-versed in full-stack web development, with many relevant projects under my belt. I am currently interning at Microsoft and have previously interned at LinkedIn and SAP. I am currently seeking for a New-grad Software Engineering position. Feel free to reach out at any one of my social outlets below!
main.bio: I'm an outgoing, Software Engineer with a passion for developing products that have real-world impact. I am well-versed in full-stack development, and have significant experience with React and NodeJS or Flask. I have a huge interest in Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies and am currently serving as the Director of Technology at SFU Blockchain. I am interested in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and am excited to see how these revolutionary technologies will shape the future of the world. If we share any common interests, please feel free to react out on LinkedIn and we can chat!
main.contactmessage: If you would like to get in contact with me, please fill out the form and I will email you back at my earliest convienience.

resume.skillmessage: I am well versed in Web Development and am actively learning everyday to broaden my knowledge on various technologies such as Blockchain Technology and Machine Learning.

minor.description: A program that established a basic foundation in business principles.

education.description: A program that focuses on the development of high-quality software for the public and private industry.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Full stack developer on the Rewards and Compensation team, under Core Functions Engineering (CFE), CSEO
Designing and implementing multitenancy for HR app that powers the rewards and compensation system for over 100K Microsoft employees
Implementing new authentication and authorization system
Created new validation system and improved REST API error handling
Implemented unit tests using XUnit
Redesigning and implementing new UI features
Participating in daily scrums and attending regular engineering design meetings

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Android developer on the LinkedIn Messaging - Group Chats team
Implemented the Group Chats Link-to-Join feature, end-to-end on Android, and is expected to significantly drive up Messaging Group Chat metrics
Rewrote the Conversation Details page using Android Jetpack to improve maintability and scalability of the LinkedIn Messaging codebase
Refactored the flow in which 1:1 conversations are converted to Group Chats
Implemented and conducted A/B testing experiments on Android
Refactored key group messaging pages using Android Jetpack
Implemented JUnit tests and Espresso UI tests
Participated in daily scrums and regular engineering design meetings

work.title: Software Development Intern
description: Full stack web developer responsible for client-side and server-side development, DevOps, and quality assurance for the Web Service Assessment Portal (WASP) Web App
Implemented and deployed to production a complete Commercial Software Review application within WASP
Increased efficiency of web service reviews done by Compliance Analysts by 200%
Resolved over 100 bug tickets and implemented 10 features in a span of 8 months
Implemented a streamlined software development process that improved team productivity by 80%
Managed deployment of code onto testing and production servers
Assumed the role of Scrum Master and designed techincal solutions to satisfy business requirements from Business Analysts

work.title: Full Stack & AI Developer (Coop)
description: Responsible for client side and server side web app development for the Porton Telemedicine Web App
Developed a live video chat system that served as a core feature in the Porton Telemedicine Web App
Integrated health organizations and employers into the Porton Telemedicine Web App that allowed the company to onboard entire organizations, rather than individual doctors
Designed testing workflows to ensure incoming features do not break existing functionality
Managed deployment of code onto testing and production servers

extracurriculars.title: Career Development Co-lead
extracurriculars.description: Organize events for the intern community at the SAP Vancouver focused on networking, and career development

extracurriculars.title: Cofounder & President
extracurriculars.description: Host events to raise awareness on Blockchain Technology and educate members of the club on how to implement Blockchain technologies in their projects.

extracurriculars.title: Cofounder & President
extracurriculars.description: I manage and oversee the operations of the club and host workshops and events for the club members and other students at SFU.

extracurriculars.org: Scouts Canada (99th SFX East Vancouver Scout Group)
extracurriculars.title: Colony Section Head
extracurriculars.description: I manage and oversee the operations of the Colony Section in the 99th East Vancouver SFX Scout Group. I plan events, run meetings, and host workshops for over 50 registered youth in the Scout group.

projects.title: CRADLE VSA (Vital Signs Alert) Platform- Patient Management System
projects.category: The CRADLE VSA Platform is an open-source patient management system built to support the CRADLE VSA system to record patient vitals of pregnant women in vulnerable countries and provide a centralized store of patient information for health organizations to consume.

projects.title: Coinbay - Classifieds Listing Web App
projects.category: A classifieds listing web app with custom built-in Ethereum blockchain cryptocurrency payment and escrow solution. Our custom Ethereum Smart Contract prevents users from bailing after a deal and allows sellers to sell with confidence.

projects.title: Savour
projects.category: A decentralized food-sharing marketplace that allows home-cooks to list their delicious home-cooked meals in a trustless, decentralized manner. Payments are fulfilled using our decentralized escrow service, built with Ethereum Smart Contracts

projects.title: Savor - Budget Tracker & Lifestyle Web App
projects.category: A budget tracker app that syncs with the user's bank account, providing hassle free budget tracking.

projects.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Bot
projects.category: An automated cryptocurrency trading bot, built with NodeJS to automatically place buy and sell orders, using a custom technical analysis algorithm.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.category: A personal website built using ReactJS

projects.title: SFU Cryptocurrency Club Website
